class.name: pupil_utils/ColoredDepth
class.description: Implement a colormap into the depth image for better viewing experience

class.name: pupil_utils/HornTransform
class.description: Nodelet responsible for the estimation of the camera pose, using rigib body transformation estimation. Horn version.

class.name: pupil_utils/P2PNodelet
class.description: Nodelet reponsible for the estimation of the camera pose, using iterative PnP algrithm. OpenCV AruCo Module.

class.name: pupil_utils/SingleMarker
class.description: Nodelet reponsible for the estimation of the camera pose, using iterative Single Marker Pose estimation algrithm. OpenCV AruCo Module.

class.name: pupil_utils/BlinkDetector
class.description: Nodelet Responsible for the blink detection processing the actual image Eye instead of the confidence factor
